them.\""},{"lineNumber":175233,"originalJapaneseLine":"「知っているでしょう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You know why."},{"lineNumber":175234,"originalJapaneseLine":"　性分ですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's just my nature.\""},{"lineNumber":175235,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ッ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...!\""},{"lineNumber":175236,"originalJapaneseLine":"日光がカオスを構え、振りかぶろうとする。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nikko raised his weapon against Chaos and prepared to strike."},{"lineNumber":175237,"originalJapaneseLine":"「日光さん……待って……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nikko-san... wait...\""},{"lineNumber":175238,"originalJapaneseLine":"「健太郎君……それに、皆も……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kentaro-kun... and everyone...\""},{"lineNumber":175239,"originalJapaneseLine":"「良かった、間に合って」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm glad you made it in time.\""},{"lineNumber":175240,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今、な……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Right now..."},{"lineNumber":175241,"originalJapaneseLine":"　皆でどうするか話し合って……","translatedEnglishLine":"We've all just finished discussing what to do..."},{"lineNumber":175242,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それで、決まったところだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"And we've made a decision.\""},{"lineNumber":175243,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……美樹ちゃんがこうなった以上、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Now that Miki-chan has become like this,"},{"lineNumber":175244,"originalJapaneseLine":"　取れる手はもうありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"there are no more options left.\""},{"lineNumber":175245,"originalJapaneseLine":"「後は、私が私の責務として、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From here on, as my duty,"},{"lineNumber":175246,"originalJapaneseLine":"　彼女をこの手で……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will handle her with my own hands...\""},{"lineNumber":175247,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、そうなんだけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, that’s true, but...\""},{"lineNumber":175248,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":175249,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……っ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...!\""},{"lineNumber":175250,"originalJapaneseLine":"　健太郎君、あなた、まさか――」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentaro-kun, you don’t mean to—"},{"lineNumber":175251,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やるなら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If someone is going to do alright...?"},{"lineNumber":175254,"originalJapaneseLine":"　美樹ちゃん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki-chan...?\""},{"lineNumber":175255,"originalJapaneseLine":"「悪い子になって……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Before she becomes a bad girl..."},{"lineNumber":175256,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この世界を破壊しちゃう前に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and destroys this world...\""},{"lineNumber":175257,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……けん、たろう、くん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ken, Taro, kun\""},{"lineNumber":175258,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おねがい、します……ぺこり……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please... *bows*..."},{"lineNumber":175259,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えへへ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe...\""},{"lineNumber":175260,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":175261,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というわけだから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, that being the case,"},{"lineNumber":175262,"originalJapaneseLine":"　日光さん、刀になってくれないかな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Nikko-san, could you become the sword for me?\""},{"lineNumber":175263,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方達……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You all...\""},{"lineNumber":175264,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":175265,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":175266,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私の主は今、小川健太郎……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My master is now Ogawa Kentaro..."},{"lineNumber":175267,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴方です」","translatedEnglishLine":"It is you.\""},{"lineNumber":175268,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……主の言葉に従いましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I will obey my master's words.\""},{"lineNumber":175269,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、ありがとう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, thank you...\""},{"lineNumber":175270,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ですが、もし……無理と思ったら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But if... you think it's impossible...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスと交わした会話を思い出していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was recalling the conversation I had with Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの娘が魔王になったらどうする？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What will you do if that girl becomes the Demon King?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自分の責務を全うするまでです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will carry out my duty to the end."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今こそ、その責務を全うする時だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now was the time to fulfill that duty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は、魔人を殺す刀になれるだけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can only become the sword that kills the demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私自身に無敵結界を破るすべはない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no way myself to break through the invincible barrier."
"To be honest, when I reunited with you in JAPAN...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 責任を取れ、その手段をやる……
そう、言われた気がしました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I felt like I was told that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあー、儂はお前がどんな道を選ぼうと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, no matter what path you choose,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 止めるつもりはないがよぉー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t intend to stop you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうして、そうしんどい道ばかり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why do you always choose such difficult paths?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光がカオスを構え、振りかぶろうとする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nikko raised his weapon against Chaos and prepared to strike.
"I'm glad you made it in time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆でどうするか話し合って……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've all just finished discussing what to do...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで、決まったところだ」
「……美樹ちゃんがこうなった以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Now that Miki-chan has become like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 取れる手はもうありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are no more options left."
I will handle her with my own hands..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎君、あなた、まさか――」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If someone is going to do it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界を破壊しちゃう前に……」
日光さん、刀になってくれないかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nikko-san, could you become the sword for me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ですが、もし……無理と思ったら……」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスと交わした会話を思い出していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was recalling the conversation I had with Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの娘が魔王になったらどうする？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What will you do if that girl becomes the Demon King?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自分の責務を全うするまでです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will carry out my duty to the end."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今こそ、その責務を全うする時だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now was the time to fulfill that duty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は、魔人を殺す刀になれるだけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can only become the sword that kills the demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私自身に無敵結界を破るすべはない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no way myself to break through the invincible barrier."
"To be honest, when I reunited with you in JAPAN...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 責任を取れ、その手段をやる……
そう、言われた気がしました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I felt like I was told that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあー、儂はお前がどんな道を選ぼうと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, no matter what path you choose,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 止めるつもりはないがよぉー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t intend to stop you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうして、そうしんどい道ばかり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why do you always choose such difficult paths?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光がカオスを構え、振りかぶろうとする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nikko raised his weapon against Chaos and prepared to strike.
"I'm glad you made it in time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆でどうするか話し合って……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've all just finished discussing what to do...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで、決まったところだ」
「……美樹ちゃんがこうなった以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Now that Miki-chan has become like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 取れる手はもうありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are no more options left."
I will handle her with my own hands..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎君、あなた、まさか――」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If someone is going to do it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界を破壊しちゃう前に……」
日光さん、刀になってくれないかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nikko-san, could you become the sword for me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ですが、もし……無理と思ったら……」
